item.title: [GRA5/GRA7/GRA9/GRA11/SBG5/WAW1/SGP1/BHS5/SYD1/DE1/UK1/OR1/VA1][Public cloud] - End of life for Kubernetes 1.26
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 15, 2025, 08:00 UTC  -  Jan 16, 2025, 17:00 UTC

Nov 21, 21:41 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be migrating all Managed Kubernetes Service to the new version.

Start time : 15/01/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 16/01/2025 17:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version.
Service improvement : The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.description:

Nov 27, 15:38 UTC

Nov 7, 13:34 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 04/12/2024 09:00 UTC
End time : 04/12/2024 17:00 UTC
Service impact : Chartmuseum will be definitely removed in prevision of upgrade to Harbor version 2.8. If you are still using Chartmuseum to manage Helm Charts, please migrate before the 4th december by following this tutorial: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-public-cloud-private-registry-migrate-helm-charts?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0058869
Helm Charts stored in Chartmuseum not migrated before this date will not be available anymore.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA2][Public Cloud] - Instances unreachable
item.description:
Dec 2, 20:59 UTC
Resolved - An incident has on our Public Cloud offer. This was affecting the availability.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 02/12/2024 20:15 UTC
End time : 02/12/2024 20:45 UTC
Service impact : Some instances in the GRA2 region were temporarily unreachable.
Root cause : This incident was due to a network equipment issue.
All services is operational since 20h45 UTC.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [DE][Public Cloud] - Object storage S3 incident notification
item.description:
Nov 29, 17:00 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 11/09/2024 08:25 UTC
End time : 21/11/2024 09:00 UTC
Service impact : The service is operational again.
Root cause : It was due to malfunctions on some hardware.
Workaround : Affected customers have been contacted since the 21/11/2024 and the matter is being followed up directly with them now.

Oct 15, 14:52 UTC
Update - Actions are still underway to restore services.
Affected customers have been identified and will be contacted regarding follow-up actions and resolution of the incident.

Sep 18, 17:12 UTC
Identified - We would like to inform you that we are having an ongoing incident.
Our teams are working tirelessly to resolve this incident once and for all.

Start time : 11/09/2024 08:25 UTC
Service impact : Due to this incident some customers may encounter accessibility problems with some of their objects.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams will conduct a series of checks to guarantee the functionality of all the hardware.
During the intervention, customers may experience difficulties in accessing some of their services.
Further information will be provided in the near future.

As soon as the situation evolves or the incident is resolved, we will keep you informed.

item.title: [EU][Public Cloud] - API incident notification
item.description:
Nov 26, 14:42 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 26/11/2024 02:50 UTC
End time : 26/11/2024 14:05 UTC
Root cause : Incident due a misconfiguration on the network device.
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Nov 26, 10:52 UTC
Monitoring - LDP Public API is now fully up & running
Only the pay-as-you-go consumption report is now impacted, all other features work as expected.

A fix has been implemented and we are now monitoring the results.

Nov 26, 10:28 UTC
Identified - The services are more stable now, and our teams are continuing to work on the complete resolution.

Nov 26, 09:25 UTC
Investigating - Please be aware an incident is in progress on our Logs Data Platform offer. It this is currently affecting the functionality.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 26/11/2024 02:50 UTC
Service impact : Public API issue on Logs Data Platform service, customers are unable to create or modify their project during the incident.
Ongoing actions : Investigating

Our teams are fully mobilized and actively working to resolve this problem.

We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.
